name: luiz.ninja
body:
### Hi, I'm Luiz.
I'm a software engineer at [Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/careers). Hopefully one day this website will have some content. In the meantime, if you want to get in touch with me, you can do that through either of:

* [fb.me/luizgcribeiro](http://fb.me/luizgcribeiro)
* [github@luiz.ninja](mailto:github@luiz.ninja)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
